channel.title: 10 Years Bootstrapping: Lessons Learned
channel.description:
Considering how long most of us here have been at it, this longer-term perspective should be interesting. It's got some pretty inspiring anecdotes.
edit: @andrey --
I'm guessing [this is the link to the article][1]?
